channel.title: Blood PK client and Source Development
channel.description:
hi i got this source and client and i want you guys to give me feed back about what i should add or fix(may need help in some parts)
[center][b]Features in the source[/b][/center] [center]
[ul][li]TUTORIAL ISLAND[/li] [li]WORKING SKILLS [/li][li]ANCIENT MAGICS QUEST[/li] [li]LOTS OF TRAINING(NEED TO KILL CERTIAN # OF MONSTERS TO WEILD STUFF)[/li][/ul]
[/center]
[center]Client Features
[ul][li]music player[/li] [li]screen shot taker[/li][/ul]
[/center]
well here are some pics of the client
[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk248/xrxex/Screenshot0000.png[/img]

[right]Kirk :)[/right]
Credits for client! 95% to java for base 5%to me for adding alot of music

hi i got this source and client and i want you guys to give me feed back about what i should add or fix(may need help in some parts)
